sentences.en: Colds are prevalent in the winter.
Despite the fact that the disease is so prevalent, treatment is still far from satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 尽管疾病肆虐，治疗却远不尽如人意。

sentences.en: Farless prevalent at this time were other truly bird - like creatures.
sentences.cn: 另一些和鸟类相似的动物在当时是不那么盛行的.

sentences.en: It was symptomatic of the prevalent mood of hesitation.
sentences.cn: 这典型地表明了普遍存在的那种犹疑不决的情绪.

sentences.en: One form of excise is so prevalent that it deserves special attention.
sentences.cn: 有一种特殊形式的附加工作,它们因十分普遍而备受关注.

sentences.en: Smoking is becoming increasingly prevalent among younger women.
sentences.cn: 抽烟在年轻女性中变得越来越常见。

sentences.en: Terpenoids are more prevalent in some arid or semiarid climates.
sentences.cn: 萜类在某些干旱或半干旱气候条件下较为普遍.

sentences.en: The custom of worshipping ancestors is prevalent among these people.
sentences.cn: 崇拜祖先的风俗在这些人中是普遍的.

sentences.en: The prevalent view is that interest rates will fall.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍认为利率会下降。

sentences.en: These prejudices are particularly prevalent among people living in the North.
sentences.cn: 这些偏见在北方人中尤为常见。

sentences.en: They are more prevalent in soils of the tropical and subtropical regions.
sentences.cn: 它们在热带和亚热带地区的土壤中较为普遍.

sentences.en: They were brought up in the liberal atmosphere prevalent in the 1960 s.
sentences.cn: 他们在六十年代盛行的自由气氛中长大.

sentences.en: This condition is more prevalent in women than in men.
sentences.cn: 这种病症在女性当中比在男性当中更为普遍。

sentences.en: We exposed some of the more prevalent myths about Chrysler.
sentences.cn: 我们揭露了当时流传比较广的一些关于克莱斯勒公司的神话.

sentences.en: Whooping cough is very prevalent just now.

trans.tran_cn: 流行的，盛行的，普遍存在的，普遍发生的
trans.tran_en: common at a particular time, in a particular place, or among a particular group of people
